data.name: SwordFight!
data.description:
SwordFight! is a fun first-person action-packed adventure. Learn to swing a sword in the castle grounds before fighting your way through an army of undead out in the city! Be part of the action, save your homeland from invasion and fight on the frontlines of the battle!
Using smooth locomotion or teleportation to move where ever you want, take control of the hero and navigate around the battlefield using the touchpad and trigger to control your movement. Run, strafe and dodge while swinging your sword at would be enemies!

For more information, contact me at http://www.plague-studios.com

changelog.change_log:
2.64

-AI strafing and combat speed has been toned down

-Weapon hitbox size have been increased
-A check has been added to check if all enemies are dead and start the next wave
-Snap rotation has been added
-Level select in the castle is much more obvious
-Can play game without completeing tutorial
Fixed a bug that caused a black death screen
Changes Made, the pointer works left handed or right handed on the controls menu, allowing the player to quit the game
Added a UI collider for the pointer to pick up with the back button.
Quit button with the back button in game, in menu it takes you back one UI screen. No mic request. Left handed support
